controls.title: Ensure the 'Password expiration policy' is set to 'Set passwords to never expire'
controls.description: Configure password policies to never expire. NIST and Microsoft recommend this approach when MFA is enabled, as forced rotation leads to weaker passwords.

controls.title: Ensure Conditional Access policies are configured to block legacy authentication
controls.description: Legacy authentication protocols do not support MFA and are commonly exploited in attacks. Implement Conditional Access policies to block these protocols.
